name: Shootin' A Round
description:
You've heard a distress call, the Darkness is tainting everything and you must stop it before it is too late! However it won't be an easy task, you'll have to fight your way through wave after wave of enemies!

- Totally free and no ads.

- Designed for touch input, but using a mouse is also possible.

- 6 stages, each with 5 waves and a final boss that will put your skills to the test.

- 5 different weapons with their own strengths and weaknesses.

- Switch between attack and charge modes.

- Defeated enemies may drop items you can pick up to recover health and energy, to change weapon, and also to increase your speed and attack damage.

- Survival mode: how many enemies can you take down before they get you?

- How to play section available, don't forget to check it out!
